page.title: 14ENERGY
page.content: {Peat}This is compressed vegetation which is cut out of the ground, dried then used for burning. Many people still cut peat in the traditional way. {Electricity }Introduced in 1957, not long after the completion of the Loch Shin Hydro Electric Scheme. Only a few houses in Durness are all electric. {Gas} Only a small percentage of people use gas.The gas that is used is called Calor gas and it is all bottled.It is bought at the Mace store.{ {Oil }A few people have oil fired stoves and central heating systems.{ {Coal }Many people burn coal along with peat. Coal is very expensive due to the high cost of transportation{ {Wood }A regular wood round allows people to burn soft wood logs.
